diff_hunk:
@@ -65,8 +65,11 @@ def testChainOfMatmul(self):
       sess.run(d)
 
       max_bytes_in_use = sess.run(memory_stats_ops.MaxBytesInUse())
+      bytes_in_use = sess.run(memory_stats_ops.BytesInUse())
       self.assertGreaterEqual(max_bytes_in_use, matrix_size_in_bytes * 3)
       self.assertLess(max_bytes_in_use, matrix_size_in_bytes * 4)
+      self.assertGreaterEqual(bytes_in_use, matrix_size_in_bytes * 3)
body: The tests you added don't distinguish BytesInUse from MaxBytesInUse. One idea is to launch a second session with a smaller graph. MaxBytesInUse should return the larger size, and BytesInUse should return the smaller size.
body_html: The tests you added don't distinguish BytesInUse from MaxBytesInUse. One idea is to launch a second session with a smaller graph. MaxBytesInUse should return the larger size, and BytesInUse should return the smaller size.
